text: Arazir aghuimɨn mɨngarim, a kamakɨn, kɨ Afeziam bagh mangɨghtɨ, ia ua nan ganighan kogham.(16:10) Nguazir kamɨn gumaziba Iesus isa kot gatɨgha ghaze, an arazir kuram gami, egh an ovengam. Ezɨ God Iesus gamizɨ a ua dɨkavizɨ anenigha ghuzɨ, an a ko iti. Arazir kamra, God gumazibar akagha ghaze, Iesus arazir aghuimram ami.
